Reviews.Title: A Few Challenges
Reviews.Author: Privacy Nut
Reviews.Content: The camera has so many features "modes" and the photos turned out great with high resolution.  However, it was very difficult to change between modes, there were long delays while the camera processed the pictures and the battery ran out quickly.  My battery did not last the whole day on a recent vacation.  I had to take fewer pictures and recharge at night.  I finally got an extra battery online.

Reviews.Title: Awesome bonuses with a few drawbacks...
Reviews.Author: Alison M. Haines "Mrs Haines"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great if you really like to take videos as well as pictures. The picture quality is good, not great, and the double flash and preview delay is a little annoying. The zoom for pictures is unlike any point and shoot I've ever worked with and still gets you great quality. The battery dies after about an hour and a half of shooting video, but that is pretty typical. The HD video is a great advantage, and taking videos isn't a daunting task thanks to the triple motion shock thing. Other digital cameras almost seemed pointless because the shaking was naturally so bad, but this is the first one where you can enjoy filming. Highly recommend getting at least a 4 GB memory card.

Reviews.Title: Awesome travel sized camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Guajardo
Reviews.Content: My husband I decided to take a trip to Europe this summer and started searching for a ultra compact pocket sized camera.  A friend of mine owns the Pentax Optio W30 - basically the same camera only capable of underwater shots.  After testing the Optio W30, we decided to buy the Pentax Optio P70 camera because we are impressed with size, features, large LCD screen, MP and ease of use.  Even my 11 year old daughter didn't need to read the manual and started using it out of the box including shooting videos.  Highly recommend for taking everyday photos.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Melanie Langstaff
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It takes great pictures and has a ton of modes for what ever type of picture your taking. Very easy to use and compact which is another thing I love about it.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy L. Tripp
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I keep it in my purse and I am ready for any occasion!!!  Perfect for on the go type of people.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: K. Alcorn
Reviews.Content: The camera is slow to process pictures and has a long lag time between shots.  The pictures are blurry too.  I have owned Pentax cameras before and I was looking forward to the 12mp.  Very disappointing!!!
